lines.text: I want to like you people; and I want you people to like me. But there can be no liking without respect, and until there is that respect you will call me MISTER Tibbs!
"Go forth and multiply, and fill the earth."
But I don't think he meant for you to do that by yourself.
Yeah, the last time I caught you using my phone in here, the emergency was about some woman who was driving your car dressed in black lace underwear.
I wish there was some things you'd forget Chief.
Ever since that woman came to town, Bubba
[sigh]
... I think he's in over his head. She's a beautiful, sophisticated young woman and Bubba, well...
You can't understand what she sees in him.
In a word, No.
Let me try to explain this to you Virgil. Bubba is a HUNK. He's manly, he's strong, he's considerate and just rippling with muscles.
Althea, Althea, you're a married woman.
Hey I'm married, I'm not blind.
Well, if Bubba's a hunk, what does that make me?
I'll stay here and round up a posse, in case I feel the need to cut anybody off at the pass.
You know Bubba had to hit him.
Like I always say, Bubba has all the fun around here!
Never fear, Parker is here.
I got a call from Randy Calhoun.
Tell him we're closed.
It's about a murder.
Did he commit it?
I don't think so. I forgot to ask.
Well, that might have been an important question.
